attributes.action: Help First Time Buyers get on the Property Ladder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First Time Buyers are struggling to get onto the property ladder due to low pay, redundancies, having to pay money out for rent and ridiculous mortgage rates.  We need more options (not necessarily part rent part buy, or Housing Association) as we want to be independant! There isn't any other options!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
